title: Greek yogurt with sliced pear
instructions: 1. Wash the pears thoroughly under cold water and pat dry with a paper towel. 2. Cut each pear in half lengthwise, remove the core and seeds using a spoon or melon baller. 3. Slice the pear halves into thin, even slices about 1/4-inch thick. Lightly brush or toss with lemon juice to prevent browning. 4. Divide the Greek yogurt evenly among 4 serving bowls, placing 1/2 cup in each bowl. 5. Arrange the pear slices decoratively on top of the yogurt in each bowl, fanning them out or layering as desired. 6. Drizzle 1/2 tablespoon of honey over each serving. 7. Sprinkle a pinch of ground cinnamon over each bowl. 8. Top each serving with 1 tablespoon of chopped walnuts. 9. Garnish with fresh mint leaves if desired and serve immediately.
description: A refreshing and nutritious snack featuring creamy Greek yogurt topped with sweet, juicy pear slices, honey, and a sprinkle of cinnamon and crunchy walnuts for added texture and flavor.
